body.name: StepRite Kitchen Mats, 2PCS Kitchen Rugs, Cushioned Anti Fatigue Kitchen Mats for Floor, Non-Slip Standing Desk Mat, Waterproof Kitchen Rug Set for Kitchen, Floor, Office,17.3"×30"+17.3"×47",Black

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Anti Fatigue Cushion] StepRite’s ergonomic anti-fatigue design helps reduce stress and fatigue on your feet and joints. The 0.4-inch anti-fatigue kitchen mat also allows you to stand comfortably for longer periods of time. What’s more, the softness of the kitchen rugs protects delicate kitchenware such as bowls and plates from breaking if dropped on the rug.

[Stain Resistant] Our kitchen mats are featured with stain resistant texture. Whether water, wine, or drinks are accidentally spilled on the floor mat, they can be easily wiped off with a damp cloth or rag.

[Non-Slip Design] This standing mat has non-slip backings which keep the rug in place firmly and securely and offer protection for kids and pets on multiple surfaces, such as tile, wood, ceramic, marble, etc. (WARNING: Please place the kitchen rugs on DRY FLAT SURFACES.)

[Durable Material] StepRite kitchen rugs are made of premium material, which is durable and offers long lasting support against deformation. The material is also phathalate-free, latex-free, and odor-free, making it friendly to both adults and children.

[Versatility] In addition to being used as an anti-fatigue kitchen rug, it can also be used indoors and outdoors in a variety of places such as laundry room, office, in front of sink, doorway, balcony, etc., providing an extra-large standing area. Essential for both home and office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blissful Comfort and Safety: StepRite Kitchen Mat Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the StepRite Kitchen Mat, 2PCS Kitchen Rugs, and I must say, it has been an absolute game-changer in my kitchen! These cushioned anti-fatigue kitchen mats have completely transformed the way I feel while cooking and standing for long periods.One of the standout features of these mats is their incredible cushioning. The moment I step onto them, I can feel the plushness and support under my feet. The thick foam layer provides exceptional comfort, effectively reducing the strain on my joints and muscles. I used to experience fatigue and discomfort after a short time in the kitchen, but with the StepRite Kitchen Mat, I can now cook, bake, and prep meals for extended periods without feeling any discomfort at all!Safety is also a top priority for me, especially in the kitchen where spills are inevitable. These mats have a non-slip backing that works like magic. I no longer have to worry about slipping or skidding on wet or greasy floors, as the StepRite Kitchen Mat stays securely in place, giving me peace of mind while working. This feature is particularly important when I'm carrying hot pots or sharp utensils around.The StepRite Kitchen Mat also impresses with its design. The subtle and elegant pattern adds a touch of style to my kitchen decor. I appreciate the fact that these mats come in a set of two, allowing me to place them strategically in high-traffic areas or near the sink and stove. The generous size ensures that I have ample space to move around comfortably.Cleaning these mats is a breeze too! I simply wipe them down or give them a quick rinse, and they look as good as new. The high-quality materials used in their construction make them durable and resistant to wear and tear. I'm confident that they will continue to provide excellent performance for a long time.Overall, I am extremely pleased with the StepRite Kitchen Mat, 2PCS Kitchen Rugs. They have truly elevated my kitchen experience by providing superior comfort, safety, and style. If you spend a significant amount of time in the kitchen and want to pamper your feet, I highly recommend investing in these mats. Say goodbye to fatigue and discomfort, and say hello to an enjoyable cooking journey!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cushion is phenomenal!
reviews.reviewText: We are about to begin the process of remodeling our kitchen. For that reason, I try not to buy too much kitchen stuff, just in case it won’t work after the remodel.I desperately needed a new rug, and I decided to go with something that was more supportive than what I had before. I also wanted a color that would go with the theme of what we have our eyes on.This fit the checklist, and it was affordable! So, I gave it a try. What I didn’t expect, was how much I would wind up liking these!I have two dogs, Border Aussie’s, so they are fairly big fur babies. These rugs do not collect shedded hair. They are so easy to wipe off, and I find both dogs laying on the mats periodically. So, I’m not the only one that finds them super comfortable.You get two rugs in this set. One is a longer runner style. The other one is your typical bathmat size rug. The rugs are thick, and they have this bounciness to them. When you step on one, it will leave the shape of your footprint in it for a second or two, and then bounce back into shape.So, far they’ve been extremely durable & that is saying something with my dogs! I really like them. I would not hesitate to purchase them again. I hope they work just as well for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cushioning for long periods in the kitchen.
reviews.reviewText: Color and non-skid characteristics plus easy to clean make this an excellent home product. Both a practical and attractive addition to my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Durable and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I like that these mats are thick and feel comfortable to stand on. I put them in front of my doors, and they do not have any wear or tear after the month that they've been out. They are easy to vacuum or wipe down too.The problem is that they are skinnier than I'd like. If someone comes in the house, it's hard to step on it and take your shoes off since it's so narrow. I also wish I hadn't gotten black because I have 3 white pets and you can see white pet hair all over them. I would recommend these but make sure you measure first and are okay with them being so skinny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supporting feet and great decor for Kitchen
reviews.reviewText: I feel the Matt’s help my back when standing on them. Also easy to clean and they stay stationary. If your thinking of buying make that move!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin material on top
reviews.reviewText: Great mat and extra soft! Only issue is the material covering the mat is extremely thin and will puncture showing white foam underneath. With 3 dogs it was sure to puncture unfortunately making may look bad.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thick, comfortable, non-slip, easy to clean—exactly what we were looking for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Comfy Mats
reviews.reviewText: These mats are perfect for the kitchen. They are easily cleaned and comfortable to stand on while cleaning dishes or doing other kitchen chores. These mats were worth the price and work well for keeping the floors dry. They also make a nice addition in front of a sliding patio door.
